title: LAS VEGAS UNITS,  DELUXE FURNISHED
posting_body: ['GREAT LOCATION.', 'LAS VEGAS UNITS...', 'DELUXE FURNISHED and MORE', '- Beautiful, Extra Large Fully Furnished unit with beautiful Shower and Bathroom, Kitchen, Living room, Balcony, Yard, Parking and much much more.', 'Just bring your cloths; we have everything else here for you.', '- Location: Silverado Ranch & Las Vegas Blvd near South Point Hotel and Casino', '- Just minutes away from strip major Hotels and Casinos and to the International Airport.', '- Close to Bus Stops, Major Grocery, Shopping Stores, Mall, I-15, 215', 'LAS VEGAS UNITS...', 'DELUXE FURNISHED and MORE', '- Up Stairs X Large:  Payment:', 'Monthly: $695 / Deposit: $695', '- Down Stairs X', 'Large Studio: Payment:', 'Monthly: $795 / Deposit: $795', '- High Speed Wireless Internet Available', '- Laundry Available', '- Parking', '- Cable TV Available', '- NO Pets', '- NO Smoking', '- Monthly utilities minimum $300', 'For more Information Please Contact:', 'show contact info']
